row.process:
!registers a snapshot in RM :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &RUNID# = SYS_ACT_TOP_NR()
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#snapshot-tool.jar" snapshot.communication Snapshot "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ? "&UC4RB_RM_HOST#" "&UC4RB_ENVIRONMENT_SNAPSHOT_GUID" "&RUNID#" "&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_GUID#" ? "&UC4RB_COMPONENT_ID#" "&UC4RB_DEPLOYTARGET_ID#" "&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_TYPE#" ? "&UC4RB_REPORT_FILENAME#" "&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_ARCHIVE#" "&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_INCLUDE#" ? "&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_EXCLUDE#" "&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_VARIABLES#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
